comment: PANICKING! Sends letter to FBI's Christopher Wray Asks for investigation details, a copy of the Written Directive sent to the White House, & to be notified of anything else they might be investigating We always hear "we can't discuss an ongoing investigation" SHE'S LITERALLY ASKING THEM WHAT THEY WILL BE INVESTIGATING!! LOL!

      :op3 (n4 / notify-01
            :ARG1 (t / they)

      :snt3 (h2 / hear-01

            :time (a3 / always))

            :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (ii4 / investigate-01
                        :ARG0 (t4 / they)))
